name: Commission Expense Summary
query:
SELECT je.posting_date, je.company, je.user_remark,
       SUM(acc.debit_in_account_currency) AS expense
FROM `tabJournal Entry Account` acc
JOIN `tabJournal Entry` je ON acc.parent = je.name
WHERE acc.account = %(expense_account)s
  AND je.company = %(company)s
  AND je.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY je.posting_date, je.company, je.user_remark
ORDER BY je.posting_date
report_script:
filters.get("expense_account") = frappe.get_single_value("Commission Policy Settings", "expense_account")


return frappe.db.get_all('Journal Entry', ['posting_date', 'company, 'user_remark'], filters = filters)
